on sew legs to body as shown in pictures below page 5 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com the skirt part of the skort row instruction stitches 1 this part is worked flat not in a circle 37 chain 38 starting in the second chain from the hook single_crochet in each chain across chain 1 t 2 single_crochet in each stitch across chain 1 t 37 10 bind off leaving a long tail sew the skirt to row 9 of the body where you left the front loops unworked the skirt should just over lap 1 or 2 stitches making it look like a skort messenger bag row instruction stitches 1 this part is worked in an oval start with a chain and then 22 work on the back of the chain to make it circular *using brown or your bag color * chain 10 in second chain from hook make 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 chains 4 single_crochet in last chain working on back of chain now single_crochet in next 7 chains 2 single_crochet in last chain join to first single_crochet chain 1 2 8 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 22 9 the flap 11 chain 1 single_crochet in next 11 single_crochet half way across the bag chain 1 t 10 15 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 t 11 16 skip 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet chain 2 and skip next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 9 decrease the strap at end of row 16 chain 1 then slip_stitch down the side of the flap until you are back at the main part of the bag chain 30 slip_stitch to the other side of the bag to attach the strap then slip_stitch in each of the 30 stitches in the chain slip_stitch into the bag to attach bind off and weave in the end page 6 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry
